details.description: The Excise Movement and Control System (EMCS) tracks movement of all excise goods travelling under duty suspension provisions (alcohol, tobacco and energy products ie hydrocarbon oil, bio-fuels and gas)
details.more_information:
Read [more information about EMCS](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/emcs/index.htm "EMCS"){:rel="external"} on the HM Revenue & Customs website.

*[EMCS]: Excise Movement and Control System
details.introduction:
The Excise Movement and Control System (EMCS) tracks movement of all excise goods travelling under duty suspension provisions (alcohol, tobacco and energy products ie hydrocarbon oil, bio-fuels and gas).

*[EMCS]: Excise Movement and Control System

details.description: Includes moving goods in the EU and commodity codes
